1469220.name: 猫模拟器
1469220.description:
If your life is tired, just be a cat, become a cute and happy cat, and run freely in the beautiful open world!

About the game:

Do you want to be a brave and cute kitten. Although life is difficult, it is full of fun. You can run freely in the vast and beautiful open world, through the forest, looking for food, hunting small animals,Catch frogs, chicks, mice, duel with dogs and sheep. You Can't even beat a chicken, in this vivid world is full of challenges.
You can be an adult cat to survive on the farm and experience survival mode, or you can play in running mode as a kitten.
